Confidential Settlement Document Per CPUC Rule 51
Gas Accord II Settlement Participants :
Attached is PG&E 's Gas Accord II ( GA II ) Settlement Proposal .
As an overview , this |0 proposal | : * Maintains the basic Gas Accord |1 structure | in place today for the period 2003 to 2007 . *
* Offers end user transportation
column3: for 2003 lower for most customers than rates in effect today . *

column1: * Provides for vintaged Redwood path rates for core customers . *

* Offers a 7.5 cent / dth |1 rate | to large customers while minimizing rate |1 changes | to other customers , minimizing the |1 incentive | for these |0 customers | to seek to bypass local transmission |1 charges | and other |0 CPUC | - approved charges . *

* Adopts |1 guidelines | to improve |1 reliability | and help moderate |1 prices | in gas commodity markets , and identifies the capital |1 projects | needed to meet these |1 guidelines | over the course of the GA II period ( 2003 - 2007 ) . *
* Provides a high |1 degree | of rate stability , with a 3.5 % escalator to capture both |1 inflation | and the cost of needed capital projects .
The guaranteed
column3: will be adjustable only for significant changes in the cost of capital or increased costs due to governmental requirements or catastrophic events . *

column1: * Preserves a rate |1 differential | between the Redwood and Baja paths , although somewhat less than the current differential . *
* Proposes a two - stage open |1 season | for firm transportation services beginning in 2003 , with end |0 users | receiving a first |1 option | on available capacity . *
* Maintains the core aggregation

|0 PG&E | also anticipates that the Core Procurement Incentive |0 Mechanism | ( CPIM ) will be similar to today 's mechanism , but will reflect the somewhat larger capacity |1 holdings | needed to meet anticipated |1 increases | in core demand and to meet a 1 - day in 10 - year cold weather |1 event | .

|0 This | also will serve as a reminder that an all - Party meeting is scheduled at PG&E 's headquarters in San Francisco on January 10 and 11 , to discuss this |1 proposal | and to respond to your questions .
The attached |0 documents | include the GA II Settlement |1 proposal | , an Attachment ( a copy of PG&E 's proposed Gas Rule 27 ) , and a set of supporting workpapers .
Finally , please note that the Settlement |0 document | and the Attachment are in " Word 2000 " format .
